name: wizz
description: AI-Native Second Brain for Engineering Managers

scripts.postinstall: plutil -replace NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription -string "Wizz uses on-device speech recognition to transcribe meeting audio." node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app/Contents/Info.plist 2>/dev/null || true && plutil -replace NSScreenCaptureUsageDescription -string "Wizz records system audio to capture what meeting participants say." node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app/Contents/Info.plist 2>/dev/null || true && codesign --sign - --force --deep node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:transcriber: mkdir -p resources/Transcriber.app/Contents/MacOS && swiftc swift/Transcriber/Sources/main.swift -o resources/Transcriber.app/Contents/MacOS/Transcriber -O && cp swift/Transcriber/Info.plist resources/Transcriber.app/Contents/Info.plist && codesign --sign - --force --deep resources/Transcriber.app
scripts.build:audiocapture: mkdir -p resources/AudioCapture.app/Contents/MacOS && swiftc swift/AudioCapture/Sources/main.swift -framework CoreAudio -framework AVFoundation -framework Foundation -o resources/AudioCapture.app/Contents/MacOS/AudioCapture -O && cp swift/AudioCapture/Info.plist resources/AudioCapture.app/Contents/Info.plist && codesign --sign - --force --deep resources/AudioCapture.app

extendInfo.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Wizz uses your microphone to detect and transcribe meeting audio.
extendInfo.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Wizz uses on-device speech recognition to transcribe meeting audio when no Deepgram API key is configured.
extendInfo.NSScreenCaptureUsageDescription: Wizz records system audio to capture what meeting participants say through your speakers or headphones.
